page.title: 12 LAW AND ORDER
page.content: We interviewed Mr. Slinn our policeman. He lives in Sapperton but has 15 villages in his 'patch'. They are Syde, Winstone, Duntisbourne Abbots, Duntisbourne Leer, Middle Duntisbourne, D. Rouse, Daglingworth, Edgeworth,F.Mansell,Coates,Tarlton, Rodmarton,Culkerton,Cherington and Sapperton.He works a 40 hour week in 8 hour shifts. He covers 23,030 acres. In 1981 he had 1928 people in his area.He used to travel round on a motor bike but now he has a van.He always carries handcuffs,a truncheon and a notebook on foot patrol but lots of extras in the van.In 1983 there were 21 crimes in his area and 90% were solved.The crime included 1 murder and 4 burglaries."Really",he said,"we are very law abiding." Most of his visits are only on trivial matters.His son Mark is at our school.
